recipes.title: Hyderabadi Chicken Biryani
ingredients: Saffron (a pinch soaked in warm milk)
Whole spices (bay leaf & cloves & cardamom & cinnamon & star anise)
steps: Wash and marinate chicken with yogurt & ginger-garlic paste & red chili powder & turmeric powder & garam masala and salt
Keep it aside for 1 hour
Heat oil in a pan
Fry onions till golden brown
Remove half the fried onions and keep aside for garnish
Add whole spices to the remaining oil
Sauté for a minute
Add marinated chicken & green chilies & tomatoes & mint and coriander leaves
Cook until chicken is tender and oil separates
Parboil basmati rice with salt and whole spices
Layer the cooked chicken and rice in a large pot
Sprinkle saffron milk & fried onions and ghee between layers
Cover the pot with a tight lid and cook on low heat (dum) for 20-25 minutes
Serve hot with raita or mirchi ka salan

recipes.title: Andhra Chicken Curry
steps: Heat oil in a pan
Add curry leaves and green chilies
Sauté onions till golden brown
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté until raw smell disappears
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft
Mix turmeric & chili and coriander powders
Add cleaned chicken pieces and cook for 10 minutes on medium heat
Pour water to adjust consistency
Cover and cook until chicken is tender
Sprinkle garam masala
Garnish with coriander leaves
Serve hot with rice or roti

recipes.title: Gongura Mutton
steps: Wash and boil gongura leaves until soft
Heat oil in a pressure cooker
Add curry leaves & onions and green chilies
Sauté until golden brown
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook until the raw smell disappears
Add cleaned mutton pieces and sauté for 10 minutes
Mix turmeric & red chili and coriander powders
Add water and pressure cook for 6-7 whistles
Open the cooker and add cooked gongura paste
Simmer until the gravy thickens
Serve hot with rice

recipes.title: Pesarattu (Green Gram Dosa)
steps: Grind soaked green gram & rice & ginger & green chilies and cumin into a smooth batter
Add salt and mix well
Heat a dosa pan and pour a ladle of batter
Spread it thin
Sprinkle chopped onions on top
Drizzle oil around the edges
Cook until crispy
Serve hot with chutney

recipes.title: Andhra Pulihora (Tamarind Rice)
steps: Heat oil in a pan
Add mustard seeds and let them splutter
Add chana dal & peanuts & red chilies and curry leaves
Sauté for 2 minutes
Add green chilies & turmeric powder and hing
Add tamarind pulp and cook for 5 minutes
Mix the cooked tamarind paste with rice
Add salt and combine well
Serve with papad

recipes.title: Classic Margherita Pizza
steps: Activate yeast by mixing it with warm water and sugar
Let it foam for 10 minutes
In a large bowl & mix flour & salt and activated yeast mixture
Knead into a smooth dough and let it rise for 1 hour
Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F)
Roll out the dough into a circle
Spread tomato sauce over the base
Add grated mozzarella cheese and fresh basil leaves
Sprinkle dried oregano
Bake in the oven for 12-15 minutes until the crust is golden and cheese is bubbly
Slice and serve hot

recipes.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
steps: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F)
Grease ramekins with butter and dust with cocoa powder
Melt dark chocolate and butter together
Whisk eggs & egg yolks and sugar until fluffy
Fold in melted chocolate mixture
Add flour and mix until combined
Pour the batter into the ramekins
Bake for 10-12 minutes until the edges are set and the center is gooey
Let cool for 2 minutes
Invert onto a plate and serve warm

recipes.title: Garlic Breadsticks
steps: Activate yeast by mixing it with warm water and sugar
Let it foam for 10 minutes
In a large bowl & mix flour & salt and activated yeast mixture
Knead into a smooth dough and let it rise for 1 hour
Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F)
Divide the dough into strips and roll into breadsticks
Brush with melted butter mixed with garlic and parsley
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top if desired
Bake for 12-15 minutes until golden brown
Serve warm

recipes.title: Vanilla Sponge Cake
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F)
Grease and line a cake tin
Sift flour & baking powder and baking soda together
Beat eggs and sugar until fluffy
Add melted butter and vanilla extract
Gradually fold in the dry ingredients and milk
Mix until smooth
Pour the batter into the prepared tin
Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean
Let the cake cool
Slice and serve

recipes.title: Homemade Apple Pie
steps: In a bowl mix flour & sugar and salt
Add chilled butter and mix until crumbly
Add ice water gradually to form a dough
Wrap and chill for 1 hour
Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F)
Roll out half the dough and place it in a pie dish
In a separate bowl & mix sliced apples & brown sugar & cinnamon & nutmeg and cornstarch
Pour the apple mixture into the pie crust
Roll out the remaining dough and cover the pie
Seal the edges and make slits for steam to escape
Brush with beaten egg
Bake for 45-50 minutes until golden brown
Cool slightly and serve

recipes.title: Butter Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken with yogurt & ginger-garlic paste & red chili powder & turmeric powder & garam masala & salt
Heat butter and oil in a pan
Add onions & sauté until golden brown
Add tomato puree & cook until oil separates
Add cashew paste & cream & mix well
Add marinated chicken & cook until tender
Sprinkle kasuri methi & simmer for 5 minutes
Serve hot with naan or rice

recipes.title: Paneer Butter Masala
steps: Heat butter and oil in a pan
Add onions & sauté until golden
Add ginger-garlic paste & cook until raw smell disappears
Add tomato puree & red chili powder & turmeric powder & cook until oil separates
Add cashew paste & cream & mix well
Add paneer cubes & garam masala & simmer for 5 minutes
Sprinkle kasuri methi & mix well
Serve with roti or jeera rice

recipes.title: Aloo Paratha
steps: Knead a soft dough with flour & water & salt & let it rest for 20 minutes
Mix mashed potatoes & green chilies & coriander leaves & ajwain & red chili powder & garam masala
Divide the dough and filling into equal portions
Roll out a dough ball & place the filling in the center & seal & roll gently
Heat a tawa & cook the paratha on both sides with ghee until golden brown
Serve hot with curd or pickle

recipes.title: Korean Fried Chicken
steps: Mix cornstarch & flour & baking powder & garlic powder in a bowl
Coat chicken wings evenly with the dry mixture
Heat oil in a pan & deep-fry chicken wings until golden and crispy
In a separate pan
mix soy sauce & gochujang & honey & sesame oil & ginger
Cook the sauce for 2-3 minutes
Toss fried chicken in the sauce until fully coated
Garnish with sesame seeds
Serve immediately

recipes.title: Tteokbokki (Spicy Rice Cakes)
steps: Boil water in a pan & add gochujang & gochugaru & soy sauce & sugar & garlic
Stir until the sauce is well mixed
Add rice cakes & fish cakes & simmer for 10 minutes until soft
Stir occasionally to coat everything in the sauce
Garnish with green onions & sesame seeds
Serve hot

recipes.title: Bibimbap (Korean Mixed Rice Bowl)
steps: Heat oil in a pan & sauté garlic until fragrant
Stir-fry carrots & zucchini & mushrooms separately & set aside
Arrange cooked rice in a bowl & place vegetables & bean sprouts on top
Add a fried egg on top & drizzle with sesame oil & soy sauce
Add a dollop of gochujang
Mix thoroughly before eating
Serve immediately

recipes.title: Thai Pad Thai
steps: Soak rice noodles in warm water until soft & drain and set aside
Heat oil in a pan & sauté garlic until fragrant
Push garlic to the side & scramble eggs in the same pan
Add shrimp and cook until pink
Stir in tamarind paste & soy sauce & fish sauce & sugar
Add noodles and mix well
Toss in bean sprouts and green onions
Garnish with crushed peanuts and lime wedges
Serve hot

recipes.title: Chinese Sweet and Sour Chicken
steps: Mix cornstarch & flour in a bowl & coat chicken pieces in the mixture
Dip coated chicken in beaten egg & deep-fry until golden
In a pan heat a little oil & sauté garlic until fragrant
Add bell peppers & onion & pineapple chunks and stir-fry for 2 minutes
Mix soy sauce & ketchup & vinegar & sugar & water in a bowl and pour into the pan
Simmer until the sauce thickens
Add fried chicken and toss to coat evenly
Serve hot with rice

recipes.title: Japanese Ramen
steps: Heat oil in a pot & sauté garlic and ginger until fragrant
Add chicken broth & soy sauce & miso paste and bring to a simmer
Cook ramen noodles according to package instructions & drain
In a bowl arrange noodles and top with sliced chicken & corn & soft-boiled eggs
Pour the hot broth over the toppings
Garnish with green onions and nori sheets
Serve immediately

recipes.title: Pani Puri (Golgappa)
ingredients: For Pani (Spiced Water): Tamarind pulp (2 tbsp)
steps: For Puris: Combine semolina & all-purpose flour & baking soda & salt in a bowl & mix well
Add water gradually to knead into a stiff dough & let it rest for 20 minutes
Roll out the dough into thin sheets & cut into small circles using a round cutter
Heat oil in a deep pan & fry the puris until golden and puffed
Drain on paper towels
For Pani: Blend mint leaves & coriander leaves & green chilies with a little water to form a paste
In a large bowl mix tamarind pulp & mint paste & black salt & cumin powder & chaat masala & jaggery
Add 4 cups of water & adjust the seasoning & chill in the refrigerator
For Filling: In a bowl mix mashed potatoes & chickpeas & onion & chaat masala & salt
To Serve: Crack a small hole in each puri & stuff with the potato-chickpea filling
Fill with chilled pani and serve immediately
